activities.description: The AI will provide a framework for a presentation on a machine learning algorithm. Students will choose one of several algorithms and outline their presentation structure. The AI will offer feedback on structure, logical flow and clarity, and provide suggestions for more impactful language.

AI will present 10 machine learning terms related to the chosen topic. Students will define them in Chinese, provide examples, and use them in sentences. The AI will evaluate usage and suggest more accurate and nuanced vocabulary.
The AI will present a machine learning concept with opposing viewpoints.  Students will craft arguments for and against each position, focusing on formal and informal Chinese expressions for debate.

The AI will present a counter-argument to the student's position. The student will formulate a response and engage with the AI in a simulated debate. The AI will provide feedback on argument structure, logic, and persuasive language usage.

The AI will present a list of technical terms related to machine learning algorithms. Students will translate, define, and provide examples in formal Chinese. The AI will assess accuracy and offer synonyms for better expression.
Students will create concise sentences using advanced grammar structures relevant to machine learning discussions. The AI will evaluate sentence structure, clarity, and precision.

Students will practice their presentation on the pre-selected machine learning algorithm, using the AI for recording, playback, and feedback. The AI will evaluate delivery, pronunciation, and fluency.

Students will rehearse answering questions about their presentation topic from an AI-generated question pool.  The AI will assess the student's ability to answer complex questions with clarity and accuracy.
The AI will present a series of debate scenarios. Students will role-play both sides of the argument, focusing on concise, clear expressions.
Students will analyze the language and persuasive techniques used in the simulated debates, highlighting effective arguments and identifying potential weaknesses.
The AI will summarize the key concepts and vocabulary learned throughout the week, providing a concise review of presentation and debate strategies.
Students will reflect on their progress, identify areas for improvement, and set specific, achievable goals for next week.
The AI will provide application scenarios requiring the use of learned skills in technical Chinese. Students will practice applying concepts and techniques in these real-world contexts.
The AI will provide comprehensive feedback on the student's presentation and debate performance, outlining areas of strength and weakness.
